```{r}

roll_one_die <- function(rolls) {
  die <- c(1:6)
  sample(die, rolls, replace = TRUE)
}

roll_one_die(10)

roll_two_die <- function(rolls) {
  roll_one_die(rolls) + roll_one_die(rolls)
}

roll_two_die(100)

```
